attributes.action: Open up immigration channels for Ukrainian refugees
attributes.additional_details: We have a moral obligation to act to assist those who are displace by Russian aggression in the face of our overtures to Ukraine.
attributes.background: I want the government to allow access to an easier process for Ukrainian refugees to enter the UK in the aftermath of the Russian invasion, so that we contribute to the ability of our European friends and allies to take in, shelter and provide aid for displaced Ukrainians.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Allow Ukrainians with family in the UK to enter the UK without a visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609397

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574
